snippet: CHERBULIEZ--Theodore. The members of the New York Psychoanalytic Society & Institute mourn the loss of our longtime member Dr. Theodore Cherbuliez. He is remembered as an insightful and effective clinician and excellent teacher. We extend our deep...
lead_paragraph: CHERBULIEZ--Theodore. The members of the New York Psychoanalytic Society & Institute mourn the loss of our longtime member Dr. Theodore Cherbuliez. He is remembered as an insightful and effective clinician and excellent teacher. We extend our deepest condolences to his family and friends. Michele Press, MD, President 1/3
